backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor providing blob storage, access control, user approval, file and folder metadata management, and admin role handling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping requested features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend components and hooks.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, access checks, profile gating, canister ID setup, and conditional UI routing.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Pending-approval screen showing the user's principal ID with copy-to-clipboard support and guidance to contact an admin.
Empty placeholder file for the admin management UI.
frontend/src/components/FileGallery.tsx: Grid-based file and folder gallery with selection, previews, actions, type detection, and navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/components/FileList.tsx: Main file browser component handling folder navigation, file operations, previews, uploads, and sorting.
frontend/src/components/FileListHeaderRo: Renders the sortable header row for the file list with optional bulk-select controls.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewModal: Displays a modal for previewing images, videos, audio, documents, or text files with navigation support.
frontend/src/components/FileUpload.tsx: Empty placeholder file for upload functionality.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Shows the footer with app version, copyright, and link attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling authentication, user info display, theme toggle, and admin panel access.
frontend/src/components/ManagePanel.tsx: Admin management panel supporting member listing, adding, removing, and viewing storage stats.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: A username setup form that debounces input, checks uniqueness, and saves the profile with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: A button that switches between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/ZoomPanViewer.ts: A container enabling zoom and pan interactions around its children with wheel and mouse drag support.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessBootstrap.ts: Bootstraps access control once per session and invalidates related React Query caches after initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout helpers, and initializes AuthClient with saved identities.
Stores per-folder view mode in memory and exposes getters and setters for list or gallery modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for calling actor methods related to access, profiles, files, and metadata operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, plus custom component styles.
frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts: Exports the current app version constant.
frontend/src/lib/canisterIds.ts: Collects backend and frontend canister IDs from various environment sources with multiple fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/dragDropDirectory.ts: Recursively extracts dropped directory contents and detects directories using the FileSystem API.
frontend/src/lib/fileLinks.ts: Provides utilities to generate file URLs, copy links, and download files via blob URLs.
frontend/src/lib/fileTypes.ts: Determines file extensions, MIME types, category checks, and human-readable labels.
frontend/src/lib/fileTypeTints.ts: Maps file categories to CSS tint classes and provides folder/unknown tint helpers.
frontend/src/lib/folderNavigation.ts: Resolves folder paths, builds breadcrumbs, and retrieves parent/containing folder paths.
frontend/src/lib/folderUpload.ts: Extracts folder structures, validates paths, and uploads folder trees with folder creation and progress callbacks.
frontend/src/lib/formatFileSize.ts: Formats byte sizes into human‑readable units using base‑1024 scaling.
frontend/src/lib/formatTime.ts: Provides functions to convert bigint nanosecond timestamps into formatted date/time strings with various formats.
frontend/src/lib/id.ts: Generates a cryptographically secure 32‑byte random hex ID.
frontend/src/lib/searchNormalize.ts: Normalizes text for diacritics-insensitive search and checks substring matches using normalized strings.
frontend/src/lib/sortFileSystemItems.ts: Sorts FileSystemItem arrays deterministically by field and direction with multiple stable tie-breakers.
frontend/src/lib/subtreeIndex.ts: Builds a set of folder IDs representing a folder’s full subtree using a parent-to-children map.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project state and active UI fix requirements for the Drive Browser app.
